answers.author: Josh Jones
answers.text:
My former employer, The City of Fort Collins, CO used this exact method. Reach out to the Assistant to the City Manager there and she'll have a complete feedback form and everything that you can use. I don't know if they're still using it though - we found that the electeds rarely filled them out after meetings. Staff should still have the form and other documents on file though that would be helpful to you.

author: Robert Corder
text: Looking for an example of a survey given to the City Council after a contentious issues has been voted upon by the City Council.  We are looking for a quick survey to give each member of the Council so that they can give staff feedback on how the issue was handled by staff; whether or not they have suggestions for improvement; how information was distributed, etc.  This particular issue was a zoning issue, but it doesn’t have to be specific to zoning.  Thanks.
title: City Council Survey: Contentious Issues
